item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: Hong Kong Housing
item.description: hk_listings <- vroom("http://data.insideairbnb.com/china/hk/hong-kong/2020-06-15/data/listings.csv.gz") Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) At first glance, there are 11187 observations of 106 variables in the data set. To improve efficiency, we carefully went through the list and selected 28 variables that we believe are most relevant to the following analysis. glimpse(hk_listings) ## Rows: 11,187 ## Columns: 106 ## $ id <dbl> 69074, 75083, 103760, ... ## $ listing_url <chr> "https://www.airbnb.co... ## $ scrape_id <dbl> 2.

item.title: Project 2
item.description: Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance Every two years, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention conduct the Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance System (YRBSS) survey, where it takes data from high schoolers (9th through 12th grade), to analyze health patterns. We will work with a selected group of variables from a random sample of observations during one of the years the YRBSS was conducted. Load the data This data is part of the openintro textbook and we can load and inspect it.
